verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> unto me all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, whatever <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>animal<s%>: it is my

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, in which you came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>; for by <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> from this <S%H2557>place<s%>: there shall no leavened bread be <S%H398>eaten<s%>.
This <S%H3117>day<s%> came you <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib<s%>.

And it shall be when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, that you shall <S%H5647>keep<s%> this <S%H5656>service<s%> in this <S%H2320>month<s%>.
<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>, and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; and there shall no leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> be <S%H7200>seen<s%> with you neither shall there be <S%H7603>yeast<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> with you in all your <S%H1366>quarters<s%>.

And you shall <S%H5046>show<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is done because <S%H5668>of<s%> <S%H2088>that<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto me when I came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And it shall be for a <S%H226>sign<s%> unto you upon your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> between your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H8451>law<s%> may be in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: for with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
you shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> this <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> in his <S%H4150>season<s%> from <S%H3117>year<s%> to <S%H3117>year<s%>.

And it shall be when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, as he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto you and to your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and shall give it <S%H5414>you<s%>

That you shall set <S%H5674>apart<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> all that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%>, and every <S%H6363>firstborn<s%> that <S%H7698>comes<s%> of a <S%H929>animal<s%> which you have the <S%H2145>males<s%> shall be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s.

And every <S%H6363>firstborn<s%> of an <S%H2543>donkey<s%> you shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> with a <S%H7716>lamb<s%>; and if you will not <S%H6299>redeem<s%> <S%H6202>it<s%>, then you shall break his neck: and all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> among your <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall you <S%H6299>redeem<s%>.

And it shall be when your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asks<s%> you in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What is <S%H559>this<s%>? that you shall say unto <S%H2392>him<s%>, By strength of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>:

And it came to <S%H6547>pass<s%>, when Pharaoh would <S%H7185>hardly<s%> let us <S%H7971>go<s%>, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, both the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, and the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>animal<s%>: therefore I <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> all that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%>, being <S%H2145>males<s%>; but all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of my <S%H1121>sons<s%> I <S%H6299>redeem<s%>.

And it shall be for a <S%H226>token<s%> upon your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and for <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> between your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: for by <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> brought us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And it came to <S%H6547>pass<s%>, when Pharaoh had let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5148>led<s%> them not through the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, <S%H3588>although<s%> that was <S%H7138>near<s%>; for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Lest what if the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5162>repent<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%>, and they <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>:

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5437>led<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%>, through the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>: and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H2571>armed<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> with <S%H7650>him<s%>: for he had directly <S%H7650>sworn<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H5927>you<s%>; and you shall carry up my <S%H6106>bones<s%> away here with <S%H5927>you<s%>.
And they took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> from <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H864>Etham<s%>, in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them by <S%H3119>day<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of a <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, to <S%H5148>lead<s%> them the <S%H1870>way<s%>; and by <S%H3915>night<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>, to give them <S%H215>light<s%>; to <S%H3212>go<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>:

He took not <S%H4185>away<s%> the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>, nor the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
